an5.231:1.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is not admirable.
an5.231:1.3: They’re not accomplished in being well-presented and doing their duties.
an5.231:1.4: They’re not very learned and don’t remember what they’ve learned.
an5.231:1.5: They’re not self-effacing and don’t enjoy self-effacement.
an5.231:1.6: They’re not a good speaker and don’t speak well.
an5.231:1.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is not admirable.
an5.231:2.1: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is admirable.
an5.231:2.3: They’re accomplished in being well-presented and doing their duties.
an5.231:2.4: They’re very learned and remember what they’ve learned.
an5.231:2.6: They’re a good speaker and speak well.
an5.231:2.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is admirable.”
